Title: Relates to notice to be provided prior to a foreclosure action by a homeowners' association
Summary: Requires notice to be provided ninety days prior to commencement of a foreclosure action by a homeowners' association or condominium board to enforce a lien for unpaid common charges, assessments, fines or fees.
LawCode: Amd ยง339-aa, RP L; add Art 20-A ยง2010, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to the foreclosure of liens for unpaid assessments due to a homeowners' association or condominium board
